snippet: Mr. Street sang on Temptations songs like “Papa Was a Rollin’ Stone,” “Masterpiece” and “Superstar.”
abstract: Richard Street, singer who was a member of the Temptations for more than 20 years, dies at age 70.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Street sang on Temptations songs like “Papa Was a Rollin’ Stone,” “Masterpiece” and “Superstar.”

headline.seo: Richard Street, Temptations Singer, Dies at 70
headline.main: Richard Street, Temptations Singer, Dies at 70
